name: simpleswap
description: SimpleSwap - A DeFi Router Implementation Project Overview This repository contains SimpleSwap.sol, a smart contract that functions as a router for a decentralized exchange (DEX). The project was developed as a final assignment for the ETH Kipu course, module 3. It replicates the core logic and functionalities of a Uniswap v2 Router, designed to interact with a specific Verifier contract that simulates the roles of a Factory and Pair in a real DEX ecosystem.
